ca.uqac.lif.labpal.plot

Interface BoxPlot

  • All Superinterfaces:
    TwoDimensionalPlot
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GnuBoxPlot

    public interface BoxPlot
extends TwoDimensionalPlot
    A "box and whiskers" diagram displaying statistics about one or more data series. Given a table in the following format:
    xMinQ1Q2Q3Max
    A……………
    B……………
    C……………
    a boxplot will display it like this: 
     ^
 |  ---
 |   |       ---      ---
 |   |        |        |
 |  +-+      +-+      +-+
 |  | |      | |      | |
 |  | |      +-+      | |
 |  +-+       |       | |
 |   |       ---      | |
 |  ---               +-+
 |                     |
 +---+--------+--------+---------->
     A        B        C
    The position of the lines and box boundaries in each data series correspond the the min/max values and quartiles of that series.
    Author:
    Sylvain Hallé
    See Also:
    BoxTransformation

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface ca.uqac.lif.labpal.plot.TwoDimensionalPlot

        TwoDimensionalPlot.Axis

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface ca.uqac.lif.labpal.plot.TwoDimensionalPlot
